   19: %%
   20: %% File:     y2k_SUITE.erl
   21: %% Purpose:  Year 2000 tests.
   22: 
   23: -module(y2k_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   29: 	 date_1999_01_01/1, date_1999_02_28/1, 
   30: 	 date_1999_09_09/1, date_2000_01_01/1, 
   31: 	 date_2000_02_29/1, date_2001_01_01/1, 
   32: 	 date_2001_02_29/1, date_2004_02_29/1
   33: 	]).
   34: 
   35: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   36: 
   37: all() -> 
   38:     [date_1999_01_01, date_1999_02_28, date_1999_09_09,
   39:      date_2000_01_01, date_2000_02_29, date_2001_01_01,
   40:      date_2001_02_29, date_2004_02_29].
   41: 
   42: groups() -> 
   43:     [].
   44: 
   45: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   49:     ok.
   50: 
   51: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   52:     Config.
   53: 
   54: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   55:     Config.
   56: 
   57: 
   58: %% #1 : 1999-01-01: test roll-over from 1998-12-31 to 1999-01-01.
   59: date_1999_01_01(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   60:     Date = {1998, 12, 31}, NextDate = {1999, 1, 1},
   61:     match(next_date(Date), NextDate),
   62:     TZD = tzd(Date),
   63:     if 
   64: 	TZD > 0 ->
   65: 	    Time = {24 - TZD, 0, 0},
   66: 	    {NDate, _NTime} =
   67: 		erlang:localtime_to_universaltime({Date, Time}),
   68: 	    match(NDate, NextDate);
   69: 	TZD < 0  ->
   70: 	    Time = {24 + TZD, 0, 0},
   71: 	    {NDate, _NTime} =
   72: 		erlang:universaltime_to_localtime({Date, Time}),
   73: 	    match(NDate, NextDate);
   74: 	true  ->
   75: 	    ok
   76:     end.
   77: 
   78: %% #2 : 1999-02-28: test roll-over from 1999-02-28 to 1999-03-01.
   79: date_1999_02_28(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   80:     Date = {1999, 2, 28}, NextDate = {1999, 3, 1},
   81:     match(next_date(Date), NextDate),
   82:     match(tz_next_date(Date), NextDate).
   83: 
   84: %% #3 : 1999-09-09: test roll-over from 1999-09-08 to 1999-09-09.
   85: date_1999_09_09(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   86:     Date = {1999, 9, 8}, NextDate = {1999, 9, 9},
   87:     match(next_date(Date), NextDate),
   88:     match(tz_next_date(Date), NextDate).
   89: 
   90: %% #4 : 2000-01-01: test roll-over from 1999-12-31 to 2000-01-01 to
   91: %% 2000-01-02.;
   92: date_2000_01_01(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   93:     Date = {1999, 12, 31}, NextDate = {2000, 1, 1},
   94:     match(next_date(Date), NextDate),
   95:     match(tz_next_date(Date), NextDate),
   96:     NextDate1 = {2000, 1, 2},
   97:     match(next_date(NextDate), NextDate1),
   98:     match(tz_next_date(NextDate), NextDate1).
   99: 
  100: %% #5 : 2000-02-29: test roll-over from 2000-02-28 to 2000-02-29 to
  101: %% 2000-03-01.
  102: date_2000_02_29(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  103:     Date = {2000, 2, 28}, NextDate = {2000, 2, 29},
  104:     match(next_date(Date), NextDate),
  105:     match(tz_next_date(Date), NextDate),
  106:     NextDate1 = {2000, 3, 1},
  107:     match(next_date(NextDate), NextDate1),
  108:     match(tz_next_date(NextDate), NextDate1).
  109: 
  110: %% #6 : 2001-01-01: test roll-over from 2000-12-31 to 2001-01-01.
  111: date_2001_01_01(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  112:     Date = {2000, 12, 31}, NextDate = {2001, 1, 1},
  113:     match(next_date(Date), NextDate),
  114:     match(tz_next_date(Date), NextDate).
  115: 
  116: %% #7 : 2001-02-29: test roll-over from 2001-02-28 to 2001-03-01.
  117: date_2001_02_29(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     Date = {2001, 2, 28}, NextDate = {2001, 3, 1},
  119:     match(next_date(Date), NextDate),
  120:     match(tz_next_date(Date), NextDate).
  121: 
  122: %% #8 : 2004-02-29: test roll-over from 2004-02-28 to 2004-02-29 to
  123: %% 2004-03-01.
  124: date_2004_02_29(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  125:     Date = {2004, 2, 28}, NextDate = {2004, 2, 29},
  126:     match(next_date(Date), NextDate),
  127:     match(tz_next_date(Date), NextDate),
  128:     NextDate1 = {2004, 3, 1},
  129:     match(next_date(NextDate), NextDate1),
  130:     match(tz_next_date(NextDate), NextDate1).
  131: 
  132: %%
  133: %% Local functions
  134: %%
  135: next_date(Date) ->
  136:     calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(Date) + 1).
  137: %%
  138: %% timezonediff
  139: %%
  140: tzd(Date) ->
  141:     {_LDate, {LH, _LM, _LS}} =
  142: 	erlang:universaltime_to_localtime({Date, {12, 0, 0}}),
  143:     12 - LH.
  144: 
  145: tz_next_date(Date) ->
  146:     TZD = tzd(Date),
  147:     if 
  148: 	TZD > 0 ->
  149: 	    Time = {24 - TZD, 0, 0},
  150: 	    {NDate, _NTime} =
  151: 		erlang:localtime_to_universaltime({Date, Time}),
  152: 	    NDate;
  153: 	TZD < 0  ->
  154: 	    Time = {24 + TZD, 0, 0},
  155: 	    {NDate, _NTime} =
  156: 		erlang:universaltime_to_localtime({Date, Time}),
  157: 	    NDate;
  158: 	true  ->
  159: 	    Date
  160:     end.
  161: 
  162: %%
  163: %% match({X, X}) ->
  164: %%    ok.
  165: 
  166: match(X, X) ->
  167:     ok.
